main.description: A special spore item that can be collected and stolen by other users. All spore records reference the origin garden DID via backlinks to enable capture-the-flag mechanics.

subject.description: DID of the origin garden (same as originGardenDid). Used for backlink indexing.

ownerDid.description: DID of the current holder of the spore

originGardenDid.description: DID of the garden where this spore originated. All spore records reference this DID via backlinks.

lastCapturedAt.description: Timestamp when this record was created (when spore was captured by current holder)
